verses.text: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God thou hast cast \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w*, thou hast broken \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w down|strong="H5921"\w*; Thou hast been angry; oh restore \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w again|strong="H3925"\w*.

\w Thou|strong="H7725"\w* hast \w made|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* land \w to|strong="H7725"\w* tremble; \w thou|strong="H7725"\w* hast rent \w it|strong="H7725"\w*: Heal \w the|strong="H5221"\w* breaches thereof; \w for|strong="H8147"\w* \w it|strong="H7725"\w* shaketh.

\w Thou|strong="H7725"\w* hast showed \w thy|strong="H7725"\w* people hard things: \w Thou|strong="H7725"\w* hast \w made|strong="H6555"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* drink \w the|strong="H7725"\w* wine \w of|strong="H7725"\w* staggering.

\w Thou|strong="H3588"\w* hast given \w a|strong="H3068"\w* banner \w to|strong="H3588"\w* \w them|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* fear thee, \w That|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* may \w be|strong="H3588"\w* displayed \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H7667"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* truth. \qs [Selah\qs*

\w That|strong="H5971"\w* \w thy|strong="H7200"\w* beloved \w may|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H5971"\w* delivered, Save \w with|strong="H5971"\w* \w thy|strong="H7200"\w* right hand, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* answer \w us|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w hath|strong="H6440"\w* spoken \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* holiness: \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* exult; \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w divide|strong="H5414"\w* Shechem, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* mete \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* valley \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Succoth.

Gilead \w is|strong="H3225"\w* mine, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* Manasseh \w is|strong="H3225"\w* mine; Ephraim also \w is|strong="H3225"\w* \w the|strong="H3467"\w* defence \w of|strong="H3225"\w* \w my|strong="H3467"\w* head; Judah \w is|strong="H3225"\w* \w my|strong="H3467"\w* sceptre.

Moab \w is|strong="H1696"\w* \w my|strong="H1696"\w* washpot; Upon Edom will I cast \w my|strong="H1696"\w* shoe: Philistia, shout \w thou|strong="H1696"\w* because \w of|strong="H6010"\w* \w me|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H3063"\w* \w will|strong="H3063"\w* bring me \w into|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H4519"\w* \w strong|strong="H4581"\w* city? \w Who|strong="H3063"\w* \w hath|strong="H3063"\w* led me \w unto|strong="H1568"\w* Edom?

Hast not thou, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w*? \w And|strong="H4124"\w* thou goest not \w forth|strong="H7993"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* hosts.
Give us help \w against|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* adversary; \w For|strong="H5704"\w* vain \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* help \w of|strong="H5892"\w* man.

\w Through|strong="H3318"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H3318"\w* valiantly; \w For|strong="H6635"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H6635"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H6635"\w* tread down \w our|strong="H3318"\w* adversaries.
